However, when you buy something through our retail links, GRAZIA may earn an affiliate commission. Aloisia Beauty is continuing to transform the skincare market. The K-beauty line is best known for being Hollywood’s favorite skincare brand. Celebrities such as Kate Hudson, Adriana Lima and Alyssa Milano swear by its natural products. Hudson shared her obsession with the company during an episode of the “Fat Mascara” podcast. The actress exclaimed, “They have an exfoliator [that] I have been using… I’ve actually been doing it all over my body. It’s just kind of fun and it just sort of like, rubs the dead skin off. I do it on my hands and on my face… I love it. It leaves me all soft.” The hydrating serums, moisturizers and exfoliants have recently expanded to include brightening products. The most recent drop treats common concerns such as hyperpigmentation, discoloration, dullness and more. The unique formulation includes six vitamins, antioxidants, humectants, and anti-inflammatory ingredients. “Our new ANTI-AGING & BRIGHTENING Collection is the culmination of two years of research and development to confront the loss of elasticity, clarity, and vibrancy that happens to the natural skin barrier over time,” said Veronica Konecke, Co-Founder. “This collection offers luxurious, effective solutions rooted in Korean skincare philosophies and innovation to achieve visible results and glowing skin, for all skin types and at any age.” All of the female-founded company’s brightening products use a concentration of probiotic-derived fermented filtrates, which have a smaller molecular weight for maximum absorption and potency, paired with other anti-aging and brightening actives. The products include clean and effective ingredients that most beauty lovers are familiar with such as niacinamide, green tea and patented d-phytogen which have become skincare buzzwords over the years. Aloisia Beauty places an emphasis on enriched skincare treatments and moisture preservation and its formulations are meant to deliver clear, hydrated, glowing skin with results you can visibly see.
